typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Name as string,
		Age as integer,
		Salary as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'first-container',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	wildcardPaths:['{Data3.txt,Data2.txt,secondTable_.csv}']) ~> source1
